title: Replace INNO YOUTH logo with user-provided logo (header + footer)

requirements.summary: Swap the existing INNO YOUTH logo asset for the new user-provided logo and render it consistently in header and footer without stretching.
acceptanceCriteria: A new logo image file is added under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` based on the user-uploaded logo.
`frontend/src/components/site/SiteHeader.tsx` uses the new logo asset path for the header logo image.
`frontend/src/components/site/SiteFooter.tsx` uses the new logo asset path for the footer brand image.
The logo displays crisply and is not stretched (keeps aspect ratio) on mobile and desktop.

file_operations.description: Add the generated replacement logo image (transparent background) at this exact path so it can be referenced by header/footer.

Update the header logo to use `/assets/generated/inno-youth-logo-v2.dim_512x512.png` and ensure styling preserves aspect ratio (e.g., keep w-auto/object-contain with a fixed height) for crisp rendering across breakpoints.

Update the footer brand to use `/assets/generated/inno-youth-logo-v2.dim_512x512.png` and ensure styling preserves aspect ratio (e.g., keep w-auto/object-contain with a fixed height) for crisp rendering across breakpoints.
